attributes.name: field
attributes.description: The data field/key to render into this column.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: The label for this column - optionally put the label into the HTML Content.

attributes.name: width
attributes.description: The width of this column in percent or pixels.

attributes.name: minWidth
attributes.description: The minimum width of the column in pixels when resizing

attributes.name: resize
attributes.description: Enable dynamic resizing for this column

attributes.name: sort
attributes.description: Enable sort events / indicators for this column

attributes.name: sortField
attributes.description: The field to sort on - dispatched with 'column-sort' event

attributes.name: sortOrder
attributes.description: The sort direction - Ascending/None/Descending represented as an integer by 1 / 0 / -1

attributes.name: align
attributes.description: Align column content to left of right
